analysis.description:
ZethrShell.WithdrawToBankroll (/unique_contracts/0x2974aa2c025aeac44bb8d284e33b9e7d527f0025.sol#154-157) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- address(UsedBankrollAddresses[0]).transfer(address(this).balance) (/unique_contracts/0x2974aa2c025aeac44bb8d284e33b9e7d527f0025.sol#155-157)
Zlots.gamePaused (/unique_contracts/0x2974aa2c025aeac44bb8d284e33b9e7d527f0025.sol#264-266) is never initialized. It is used in:

Zlots.ZTHTKNADDR (/unique_contracts/0x2974aa2c025aeac44bb8d284e33b9e7d527f0025.sol#274) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- _zthToken (/unique_contracts/0x2974aa2c025aeac44bb8d284e33b9e7d527f0025.sol#655-656)

Zlots.ZTHBANKROLL (/unique_contracts/0x2974aa2c025aeac44bb8d284e33b9e7d527f0025.sol#276-277) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- constructor (/unique_contracts/0x2974aa2c025aeac44bb8d284e33b9e7d527f0025.sol#280-295)
